A diet mode allows players to gauge their caloric intake and expenditure as well as exercise regimen.

name: Aerial Nature Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 2
summary: Elevate your puzzle-solving journey to new heights as you explore Earth's wonders from above with this expansion.

name: Aethus
summary: Aethus is a story-driven survival game with a low-poly isometric style and deep, systemic gameplay. Explore a futuristic underground world to mine and prospect for the valuable resources you need to build up your mining outpost, while unraveling a dystopian corporate conspiracy.

name: Aerial Nature Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 4
summary: Elevate your puzzle-solving journey to new heights as you explore Earth's wonders from above with this expansion.

name: Aerial Nature Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 1
summary: Elevate your puzzle-solving journey to new heights as you explore Earth's wonders from above with this expansion.

name: Aeterna Noctis: Virtuoso
summary: Aeterna Noctis: Virtuoso is a boss rush mode that allows players to face the bosses they already defeated during the base game, but includes new difficulty modes, combat patterns, and behavior!

name: Aerial Nature Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 3
summary: Elevate your puzzle-solving journey to new heights as you explore Earth's wonders from above with this expansion.

name: Aetherift
summary: A difficult co-op dungeon running roguelike for 2-10 players. Gear up and defeat challenging bosses with action combat and team based tactics. Build your character however you like, from nimble tanks to heavy mages.

name: Aerofly RC 10: RC Flight Simulator
summary: Aerofly RC 10 is the ultimate radio controller flight simulator for beginners and experts alike.

name: Aerofly RC 10: Expansion Pack 2
summary: The Aerofly RC 10 Expansion Pack 2 includes 100 new models and 20 new sceneries. Improve your flying skills or just have fun with the various new models in highly detailed sceneries.

name: Aerofly RC 10: Expansion Pack 1
summary: The Aerofly RC 10 Expansion Pack 1 includes 100 new models and 20 new sceneries. Improve your flying skills or just have fun with the various new models in highly detailed sceneries.

name: Aequor
summary: Aequor is a 15-30 minute game about cave diving.

name: Aeruta
summary:
A bread revolution across the world now begins!
Aeruta is a side-scrolling action game with a shop management twist, fight monsters for materials and use them to make breads, then finally make the deserted town popular again!

name: Aegis Dilemma: Veritas Omnia Vincit
summary: Several centuries have passed since the Blight Era ended. All the suffering of the time seems to be over. Enter the journey of Jules, a normal mercenary thrust into unusual circumstances. Follow her journey to find the truth about herself and her close friends….

name: AE Mini Game Collection
summary:
Four minigames includes:

- Breakout.
- Firemen.
- Maze game.
- Invaders DS.

name: Aether
summary: Aether is a fangame of the classic indie hit, Yume Nikki. A prequel to Nihil, the game follows Hirumataiyo exploring her dreams. With her mindscape split in half, she must collect various Effects while her Shadow watches from deep within her subconscious.

name: Aeterna Lucis
summary: Aeterna Lucis is the highly anticipated sequel to Aeterna Noctis. Following the gameplay steps of the first entry in the series, Aeterna Lucis is a Metroidvania that combines fast-paced combat, a large interconnected map, secret hunting, optional challenges, and a rich and deep story.

name: A.E.
summary:
A port of the classic computer game, A.E. (Which stands for Anti Environmental) is a most unusual 5200 prototype. It was never announced by Atari nor was it mentioned in any internal documents. A.E. is an arcade style shooting game in which you have to shoot down waves of evil flying mechanical stingrays in order to save your planet.

The Atari 5200 version only has four levels as opposed to ten that the computer versions boast. The loading times for the levels are also longer due to hardware constraints of the Atari 5200.

name: Aeon Nightmares
summary: Aeon Nightmares is a story focused horror themed platformer inspired by Cave Story, LISA, Yume Nikki and Haibane Renmei.

name: AEW: Rise to the Top
summary: Idle game where you run the promotion and collect wrestlers to fight in matches.

name: A.E.
summary: A.E. is a Space Invaders inspired game with a 3D view. In A.E. the earth is under attack by swarms of aliens who drop bomb after bomb and it's your job to defend planet Earth. You control a laser cannon that moves horizontally at the bottom of the screen. To earn point you should shoot all the alien forces before they shoot you! The game becomes more challenging when you progress in the game as the alien swarm splits up and attack you from several sides. This version is a homebrew version released in 2012

name: Aery: Stone Age
summary: In Aery – Stone Age you play as a little flying spirit that watches humanity in its early states evolve. You will discover a long-forgotten land with beautiful environments, and you will be able to enjoy the feeling of flying while exploring a whole world filled with beauty and little secrets.

name: Aery: Cyber City
summary: In Aery Cyber City you play a little bird on its journey to find a home after losing its dear friend. You will discover unknown, giant, and beautiful environments and you will be able to enjoy the feeling of flying while exploring a whole world filled with beauty and little secrets.

name: Aery: Ancient Empires
summary: In Aery - Ancient Empires you play as a little bird-like spirit that watches ancient civilizations evolve. You will discover unknown, giant, and beautiful environments and you will be able to enjoy the feeling of flying while exploring a whole world filled with beauty and little secrets.

name: Aeon on Mosaic: Anemone
summary: Five stories, a life. In an accident, the man named "Miracle" met the girl he hit, and the trajectory of his life has changed since then. Ten years, in the scattered fragments of time, witness together his precious memories.

name: Aerial Rave
summary: Ever wonder what Devil May Cry would be like if the entire game was in the air? Climb as high as you can while making sure to be stylish! Rack up kills and altitude while avoiding falling to your death!

name: Aery: Midnight Hour
summary: In Aery – Midnight Hour you play a little bird on its journey to the devils Halloween party after hearing Dracula talk about it. Enjoy your journey as a little bird and enjoy the feeling of flying while exploring a whole world filled with beautiful, and scary little secrets.

name: Aeris
summary: Complete challenges or fly freely all around the world!

name: Aerial_Knight's We Never Yield
summary: Discover pulse-pounding stylized parkour action as you run, jump, smash, and slide through an afro-futurist-inspired kingdom. Enjoy a single-player or two-player local cooperative mode and experience the story of two brothers and their unexpected return to their lost kingdom.

name: Aery: Peace of Mind
summary: Calm down from the hassle of your daily life, experience the feeling of flying, and immerse yourself into beautiful and atmospheric landscapes.

name: Aetherise
summary: You are created as a new soul directly from the Aether, you don't know why you're here or what you're supposed to do. As you start exploring the world, you start making up choices for yourself, and eventually decide how the world around you will evolve with you.

name: Aelfric the Wondrous
summary: A short kinetic novel made by LadyMeowsith.

name: Aerial Cleaner
summary: Players will take on the role of a high-altitude cleaner, using a water gun to clean dirt on tall buildings while also battling monsters flying around to protect their lives.

name: Aether Fly
summary: Go on a journey through countless dimensions shaped by bullets and sound.

name: Aery: Calm Mind Bundle
summary:
This bundle features the games of the Aery - Calm Mind series. These ganmes are an interactive game experiences that are designed to relax your mind and soul.
You jump into the role of a little bird, explore beautiful landscapes and collect magical crystals that mark certain landscapes.
Because there are no enemies or any other danger in this game you will be able to lean back and enjoy the scenery and the sensation of flying. It is a great game for relaxing and calming down after an exhausting day full of hassle.
Of course, you can always select the level that you feel helps most to relax yourself. Most levels can be finished quite quickly so that you can freely choose spend time exploring the environment but you don't have to stay for too long if you are just looking for a short moment of peace and enjoyment.
This game features a collection of some the most beautiful sceneries from the Aery franchise.
We hope you like them. So lean back and take a deep breath.

name: Aery: Peace of Mind 2
summary: Calm down from the hassle of your daily life, experience the feeling of flying, and immerse yourself into beautiful and atmospheric landscapes.

summary: Aeronesia is a non-linear platform RPG with emphasis on exploration, combat, dialogue and quest-based progression. After an accident transports you and hundreds of other people into an alien world, it's up to you to find a way to survive and discover some means of getting back home.

name: Aero Fighters
summary: The SNES port of Aero Fighters is one of the rarest standard North American releases, produced in very limited quanitities.

name: Aery: Time Traveller Bundle
summary:
This bundle features the games of the Aery - Calm Mind series. These ganes are an interactive game experiences that are designed to relax your mind and soul while following an exciting story.
You jump into the role of a little bird, explore beautiful landscapes and collect magical crystals that mark certain landscapes.
Because there are no enemies or any other danger in this game you will be able to lean back and enjoy the scenery and the sensation of flying. It is a great game for relaxing and calming down after an exhausting day full of hassle.

Most levels can be finished quite quickly so that you can freely choose spend time exploring the environment but you don't have to stay for too long if you are just looking for a short moment of peace and enjoyment.
This game features a collection of some the most beautiful sceneries from the Aery franchise.

name: Aesthetic Clicker
summary: Aesthetic Clicker is not your average clicker game! Click the sun to get collectable items from time to time.

name: Aero The Acro-Bat
summary: Help Aero rescue his friends and girlfriend, so everyone can enjoy the circus again!

name: Aero Battle Royale
summary: Dominate the skies in breathtaking environments, battling opponents and mastering high-speed flight. Utilize your weapons and piloting skills to be the last pilot soaring!

name: Aero The Acro-Bat 2
summary: Remaster of Aero The Acro-Bat 2.

name: Aero The Acro-Bat: Rascal Rival Revenge
summary:
Help Aero rescue his friends and girlfriend, so everyone can enjoy the circus again!
The 2002 remake of Aero the Acro-Bat is back and better than ever!

This remake includes improved sprites, modified stages and skills, as well as a whole new comic-style introduction scene.

name: AEW: Fight Forever - All Season Pass Bundle
Aether Singularity
summary: Take on the role of a special agent and fight against digital demons from the Aethernet with your Daemon partner. Something's gone wrong in a prominent research facility, and you and your squad have been deployed to uncover the source of the demonic threat that's been unleashed. Destroy all demons!

name: Aether Diving
summary:
"The Aether Diving program aims to perceive energy levels in the body and help get rid of imperfections. These imperfections get in the way of a healthy lifestyle. Pairing the latest in technology and relentless study of the Divine Scriptures, we have kept our followers’ faults and defects at bay. Join us now, diving deep into consciousness and freeing the mind from torment. Enlightment awaits."
-High Priest Maxime

name: Aetheria: Whispers of the Forest Moon
summary: In the enchanting world of Aetheria, three fairy warriors are on the cusp of graduating from their academy when their city is suddenly attacked. Embark on epic quests and missions to uncover the source of the darkness threatening their land.

name: Aetherian Chronicles
summary: Aetherian Chronicles is a 3D Casual SideScroller MMORPG focused on interaction with AI controlled players. Explore, train, party up, make friends and trade with real people or AI controlled players! Customize your character to your hearts content and choose your own way to experience your adventure!

name: Aetherdale
summary: Fight your way through the magical kingdom of Aetherdale in this roguelite, collecting powerful weapons and artifacts along the way.

name: Aether Collector
summary: A surreal point-and-click adventure about harvesting mysterious Aether in an abandoned town. As a new corporate hire, explore a reality-bending anomaly, uncover dark secrets, and confront existential horrors while questioning the true nature of your mission.

name: AetherShot
summary: Aethershot is a 2D top-down rogue-lite with a spell crafting system to allow for great customization when delving into the trial grounds at the Temple of Masrong.

name: Aerofly FS Flight Simulator
summary: Welcome aboard, Captain. Fly around the world to thousands of airports in detailed aircraft with 3D cockpits. Prove your skills in many challenging missions.

name: Aesthetic
summary: A game about personal revelations, self reflection, and Magic: The Gathering cards.

name: Aegis Force: The Scorian War
summary: Aegis Force is a single player, story-driven, strategy RPG (SRPG) that has an engaging grid-based tactical combat system. It is designed in a breathtaking 2.5d pixel art style. Players can recruit for and customize their party, using gameplay that includes full world and town exploration.

name: Aeonic
summary: In Aeonic you experience the greatest events in different parts of the planet in the most important epochs of civilization throughout the whole history from the beginning to the future in one playthrough.

name: Aeromachina
summary: You are Bogey, an android evolved from the remains of abandoned aircraft – but fight and flight are the only things keeping you from returning to scrap. Battle across the remnants of Earth and solve humanity's disappearance in this nostalgic 3D Platformer Metroidvania!

name: Aery: Dream Land
summary: Escape the daily hustle, feel the freedom of flying, and immerse yourself in beautiful, peaceful landscapes.

name: Aero Cosmos
summary: Soar through the void—master the skies beyond the stars.

name: Aether & Iron
summary: Immerse yourself in this narrative RPG set in an alternate 1930s where anti-gravitational technology has taken cars, roads, and even New York City into the sky. Muster a crew, master tactical, turn-based combat, and unravel the dark secrets lurking beneath the floating metropolis.

name: Aerial Lockdown
summary: Aerial Lockdown, an Arcade game where you'll navigate your airplane over a factory-filled city. Destroy them! Blow them to pieces! But avoid the mines in the sky. Now fly my friend, and make Davie Bones proud!

name: Aera Flying Heroes
summary: Dive into a vertical shoot 'em up blending action with a fantasy-aviator universe. Face waves of enemies, upgrade your ship, and take on epic challenges against formidable bosses. Accessible, captivating, and designed for enthusiasts, this game promises an intense and unforgettable experience.

name: Aerial_Knight's DropShot
summary:
Aerial_Knight’s DropShot is a fast, stylish action shooter that throws you straight out of a plane and into the chaos. Take out enemies, dodge wild traps, and make it to the ground first. Filled with finger blasting, Dragons, Powerups, and a bunch of stuff trying to take you down midair. Don't let anything get in your way of becoming a legend! Just try to look cool & land in one piece!

Fall, powerup, Takedown dragons, just try to look cool & land in one piece!

name: Aesop Rock's Black Hole Superette Experience
summary: A surreal first-person exploration game where you roam a fictional convenience store, collect hidden audio fragments, and unlock cryptic wisdom. Sample the full Black Hole Superette album, discover hidden easter eggs, and dive into a twisted soundscape of interactive hip-hop absurdity.

name: Aery: Peace of Mind 3
summary: Calm down from the hassle of your daily life, experience the feeling of flying, and immerse yourself into beautiful and atmospheric landscapes.

name: Aetherglen
summary: Aetherglen gives you the freedom to build your home anywhere on your land. Rebuild the town, attract new NPCs, and shape a thriving world through farming, crafting, and combat! Inspired by Rune Factory, Harvest Moon, Stardew Valley, and My Time at Portia.

name: Aetherfall
summary: Aetherfall is a stylized third-person extraction shooter set in an elemental apocalypse, where players explore dangerous zones, engage in dynamic elemental combat, scavenge for powerful loot, and build their characters while risking it all to survive and dominate.

name: Aestheta
summary: A roguelike royalelike about warriors from across space and time, fighting to claim a wish from the Star of Aestheta. Strategize your tactics, enhance your troops, and outwit your opponents to rise to the top!

name: Aeternum Grand Plaza
summary:
Aeternum Grand Plaza is an anomaly-seeking game set in a hotel with different scenarios and inspired by "The Exit 8". In this game, the player must progress through the various floors of the hotel, trying to reach the exit while observing the details of the hallways they walk through, looking for strange elements that might indicate it’s not the correct hallway.
The procedure is simple: if the hallway contains no anomalies, the player must continue forward to advance through the floors. But if the hallway contains strange elements, you must turn back and keep ascending floors to try to reach the exit.

name: Aery: Titans of the Future
summary: Soar through a futuristic world, glide past robots, and explore high-tech landscapes in Aery - Titans of the Future!

name: Aero Fighters Special
summary: Sonic Wings Special was ported to arcade as Sonic Wings Limited (Aero Fighters Special in North America). It runs on a Sony ZN-1 JAMMA board.

name: Aerial Aces
summary: Aerial Aces is a multiplayer arena shooter with fast paced combat and large open maps. Host a server and face off against friends in frantic deathmatch, or hone your movement abilities in offline practice.

name: Aeoliada
summary: 3D Action RPG set in a mix of Ancient Greece and 80s Synthwave about a demigoddess queen cancelling her enemies with high kicks, a katana and a greatsword.

name: Aephemera
summary: Aephemera is a short horror game. Wearing headphones is recommended.

name: Aether
summary: Aether is a fantasy/horror adventure game in which you play as a man bestowed with great power, tasked with venturing into abandoned buildings full of demonic entities, in hopes of finding ancient artifacts that may very well turn the tide of a war beyond his comprehension.

name: Aetherial
summary: Exiled and disgraced, you lead a forgotten clan through the frozen wilds to reclaim your family’s honor. Build your warband, forge uneasy alliances, and shape your legacy in this grounded Viking survival adventure.

name: Aether Effect
summary: Dig, Build, Explore! In this sandbox survival game, venture through a vast procedurally-generated infinite world. Mine resources, construct your homestead, craft and drive vehicles, delve into mining, cultivate, livestock, automated machinery, and uncover the truth behind the world.

name: Aether Brew
summary: Inherit a forgotten workshop and master the art of potion making in "Aether Brew"! A cozy, exploration-driven alchemy RPG game where you restore magic and uncover secrets in a mystical world.

name: Aetherbound
summary: Aetherbound TD is a run-based tower defense roguelike where every choice matters. Draft powerful towers and upgrades, adapt to escalating enemy threats, and hold the line before the battlefield crumbles beneath you!

name: Aenigmarch
summary: Step into a chilling mystery and peel back the ominous veil shrouding a peaceful southern Russian town.

name: Aerosurge
summary: Perform daring aerial stunts, destroy your enemies and weave through hazardous environments to complete fast-paced missions. Upgrade and customize your jet to handle any situation and show off your piloting skills in this fast-paced arcade flying game.

name: Aery: Viking Saga
summary: Enjoy a breathtaking journey in Aery Viking Saga, where you take flight as a majestic bird soaring through stunning Viking inspired landscapes.

name: Aeon Tempus
summary: Aeon Tempus is a cinematic action‑adventure steeped in real history. You play a time‑traveling researcher solving mysteries across ancient civilizations—uncover artifacts, navigate political intrigue, and rewrite the past.

name: Aeos: The 18 Plus NSFW Adventure Generator
summary: Aeos: The 18 Plus NSFW Adventure generator is an open world campaign based adventure and RPG video game featuring two main characters currently, with options to choose from male or a female protagonist.

name: Aerocube
summary: AEROCUBE is a Ski-Fi Roguelike + First-Person Boomer Shooter in a huge mysterious cube that always rotates randomly. Each room of AEROCUBE is different, but one thing stays the same: something’s always behind you, ready to kill.

name: Aegis Protocol
summary:
Halloween was supposed to be simple.

Halloween is off to a rough start. The plan was simple: get ready, grab your friend, and hit the party. But when the mayor turns up dead in a back alley, "simple" is officially off the table. Meet Sunny Summers. She's got a moody attitude, a wardrobe that's 99% black, and zero interest in being a hero — or anything positive really. She takes out her mood swings on her AI companion Cogs, a lovable penguin robot. They are, without a doubt, the worst duo to ever be tasked with solving a murder. But sometimes, you don't get to choose your adventure.

name: Aerthlings
summary: Use your NFC-enabled ÆRTHLINGS collectible toys to hatch, trade, and evolve digital creatures in the mobile game to rebuild ÆRTH.

name: Aexxos
summary: Command 25 ship variants with 20+ upgrades in a living, multiplayer galaxy. Explore, trade, mine, and fight epic real-time battles. Forge alliances or betray rivals—your choices shape the universe. Dive into stunning space combat now!

name: Aerial Raider
summary: Embark on an exhilarating journey in Aerial Raider, a nostalgic top-down arcade shooter that combines classic 1980s pixel art with high resolution backgrounds and high-quality modern audio. Step into the cockpit as Commander Kael Riven and take to the skies in a relentless battle against the Varkari, an alien race from a dying sun. Your mission: shoot down waves of foes, navigate through intense aerial dogfights, and uncover a compelling story that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

name: Aetherion
summary: A calm 2D pixel game full of magic, exploration, and light combat.

name: Aery: Peace of Mind 4
summary: Take a break: Explore, enjoy, relax.

name: Aenoic Abyss
summary: Swap between two heroines (Paladin/Mage/Assassin/Centaur Archer) instantly in this 2D pixel-art roguelite platformer, forge permanent Diablo-inspired builds with 200+ affix combinations to conquer cycle-reborn abyssal labyrinths and rend the holy veil of the Purification Ritual.

name: Aegers Borg
summary: You are in charge of the village called "Aegers Borg" manage the village her resources through assigning villagers, resolving events or by completing special rituals, develop and prepare the village because "winter is coming".

name: Aero
summary: Challenge your friends in an exciting multiplayer ball parkour game. Customize your ball with skins, unlock unique abilities, and master dynamic obstacle courses. Compete for the top spot, show off your skills, and enjoy endless fast-paced parkour action together.

name: Aeon Directive: The Interview
summary: 50 binary questions. Infinite consequences. Observe every detail... the environment could change. Fail to notice an anomaly, and you fail the test. The further you progress, the more rooms you have to remember. Permadeath.

name: Aery: Winter Wonderland
summary: Explore a serene winter world in Aery – Winter Wonderland, collecting crystals and uncovering Frosty’s magical journey.

name: Aerial Camera Simulator
summary: Unlike other flight sims, mastering a cable camera requires a different skill set. Precisely position the camera dolly within a fixed 3D space — a control entirely independent of the camera's aim. Test your spatial awareness in this unique simulation, playable solo or in local co-op.

name: Aerial Battle Frame: Vernion
summary: Control a robot with the mouse and challenge yourself to find the way out of a dark, twisting cave!

name: Aeons of Rebirth
summary: Aeons of Rebirth is a short, strategic incremental journey about exploring planets and building the greatest space empires ever!

name: Aerocorp
summary: A randomly generated horror game about escape

name: AeroSpace Engineering
summary: Step into the cockpit of creativity in AeroSpace Engineering | Sandbox – the ultimate physics-based simulation where your imagination meets the laws of aerodynamics.

name: AeroStrike
summary: AeroStrike is an aerial shooting game set against a desert backdrop.

name: Aerotopia
summary: Embark on a journey from Stone Age to industrial power in ZeroFactory, where survival meets automation in a magical, corrupted world. Face bosses, harness artifacts, and build a mechanical empire.

name: Aeschylus: Death
summary: Die. Fight your way back to life. Save the world. After his death, Aeschylus unintentionally stumbles into an adventure that leads him on a path back to life. Dodge traps on the path, use the weapons you find to defeat hordes of monsters and fight powerful boss monsters.

name: Aesos
summary: Lead a spaceyard: juggle contracts, design, prototype, and build all types of ships—from single-seat fighters to giant cruisers. Create custom vessels to meet precise client specs, then take the helm yourself to prove their worth.

name: Aether Rush
summary: Become a mercenary courier in Lumina. Every Æther delivery is risky and coveted. Upgrade your vehicle, evade patrols, and choose your alliances: ASTRAEN or DOVAREN. Earn reputation, exclusive perks… and enemies.

name: Aether’s Echo: Yazid’s Paradox
summary: Face your greatest enemy—yourself—in Aether's Echo: Yazid's Paradox, a challenging 2D platformer where you control time to conquer puzzles and precise jumps. Climb a mysterious mountain filled with escalating trials, shadowy clones, and atmospheric storytelling.

name: Aether Hexxen: Death-Space Requiem Act1
summary: A futuristic visual novel filled with mature romance, humor, strategy, drama, & more. A space-opera adventure filled with developing relationships with a diverse cast of motivated, personable characters. Save humanity & friendly aliens from servitude or extinction out in the stars.

name: Aerosurfer
summary: Glide and surf through handcrafted tracks at breakneck speed. The closer you fly to the ground, the faster you go! Chase your best times, race against your ghost, and climb the leaderboards in a high speed journey of control and flow.

name: Aeon Guard
summary: Aeon Guard is a motion-controlled power-casting game created for the Nex Playground. Players defend against waves of enemies by tracing patterns to unleash a celestial arsenal of powers.

name: Aether League
summary: Enter the Aether League and prove your mastery in a competitive fantasy arena, where champions rise by outplaying their rivals.

name: Aetherdrift
summary: Aetherdrift delivers fast-paced surfing, rocket-jumping, and grappling through a visually striking abstract world. Enjoy pure, uninterrupted gameplay and explore hidden lore at your own pace, without dialogs, cutscenes, or loading screens to slow you down.
